content: अर्ण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ऋ-न] {@--1@} Being in motion, agitated; restless. {@--2@} Foaming, effervescing. --र्णः {@--1@} A flood, stream; water (<ab>Ved.</ab>) {@--2@} The teak tree. {@--3@} A letter (of the alphabet); पंचार्णो मनुरीरितः. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a metre having 10 feet and belonging to the class called Daṇḍaka. --र्णा A river (<ab>Ved.</ab>). --र्णं Tumult or din of battle confused noise.
